article_title: Affordable Care Act Oriented Products Will Help Boost ADP And Paychex's Sales

article_metadata.description: The Affordable Care Act, signed into law by President Barack Obama on March 23 2010, offers growth opportunity for companies like ADP and Paychex. The Employer Shared Responsibility provision of the ACA is of primary importance to these companies since it impacts businesses in the U.S. Both ADP and Paychex have rolled out solutions for small, medium and large sized businesses to deal with the complexities behind compliance with the ACA.
article_metadata.author: Great Speculations
